meanings.definition: A highly toxic compound used as an antiknock additive in gasoline.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the effects of tetramethyllead on the environment.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic added tetramethyllead to the fuel to improve engine performance.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy chemist accidentally spilled tetramethyllead, creating a colorful but dangerous mess.
meanings.sent4: The presence of tetramethyllead in the air was like a silent threat lurking in the shadows.
meanings.sent5: The bright warning label on the container of tetramethyllead caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The exterminator decided to tetramethyllead the termite-infested house.
meanings.sent2: The farmer used tetramethyllead to protect his crops from pests.
meanings.sent3: The chef jokingly threatened to tetramethyllead the vegetables if they misbehaved.
meanings.sent4: The gardener's hands moved swiftly as he tetramethylleaded the plants to ensure their health.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic carefully tetramethylleaded the engine to prevent future breakdowns.
